comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Adalbert von Falk (* 1. September 1859; † 4. März 1930) was a Prussian Officer, at last General of the Infantry. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adalbert_von_Falk (german) "German divisional commander who was the son of supreme court justice and Prussian Minister of Culture Adalbert Falk. General von Falk served under von Hindenburg during the battle at Tannenberg, commanding troops of the 2nd Infantry Division. In 1916, he became von Quast's deputy commander of IX. Army Corps." from home.comcast.net/~jcviser/aka/falk.htm
